casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Rene RODRIGUEZ, Defendant-Petitioner. C-633 September Term 2017
080088 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 28, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-002212-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted, in part, and the matter is summarily remanded to the trial court for an evidentiary hearing on the post-conviction relief petition. Jurisdiction is not retained.
